title: User Sign-Up with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up using valid email, username, and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Fill in valid email, username, and password fields.
Submit the sign-up form.
Confirm that sign-up completes successfully and user is redirected to home or dashboard.

title: User Sign-Up with Invalid Email
description: Ensure that the sign-up form shows appropriate error when an invalid email format is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Enter invalid email format, valid username, and password.
Submit the sign-up form.
Check that an email format validation error is displayed and sign-up is blocked.

title: User Sign-In with Correct Credentials
description: Confirm that users can log in successfully using valid registered credentials and session persists.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Enter valid email and password.
Submit the sign-in form.
Verify login succeeds and user lands on home or seller dashboard.
Check that session persists on page reload.

title: User Sign-In with Incorrect Password
description: Verify proper error message appears when a user attempts login with an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Enter valid email and incorrect password.
Submit the sign-in form.
Confirm an invalid credentials error message is shown and login is blocked.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Ensure that users can request a password reset and successfully reset password via email link.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Enter registered email address.
Submit the password reset request.
Confirm that a reset link email is sent.
Use the reset link to set a new password.
Verify user can log in with the new password.

title: Load Home Page Product Grid Performance
description: Validate that the home page product grid loads and renders within 2 seconds on a broadband connection.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page.
Measure page product grid load time and verify it is under 2 seconds.
Confirm UI components including search, categories, and CTAs are rendered correctly.

title: Category Page Filtering and Pagination
description: Verify that category pages correctly display products with filters applied and support pagination.

steps.description: Navigate to a category page.
Apply multiple filters such as price range, subcategories, and ratings.
Confirm product list updates accordingly with applied filters.
Navigate through pagination controls.
Verify correct products load on each page.

title: Detailed Product Page Elements and Chat Initiation
description: Confirm that product detail pages show image galleries, ratings, seller info, variant options, and enable chat initiation.

steps.description: Navigate to a detailed product page.
Verify image gallery is functional and images can be viewed in detail.
Check product ratings and reviews are correctly displayed.
Confirm seller information and product variants/options are visible.
Click chat initiation button.
Verify real-time chat conversation is created and displayed.

title: Product Creation with AI-Assisted Description Suggestions
description: Validate that sellers can create new products using AI suggestions for description, category, and upload images with variant handling.

steps.description: Log in as seller and navigate to the product creation form.
Fill in basic product details and request AI-enabled description/category suggestions.
Confirm suggested descriptions and categories are displayed for selection.
Upload multiple product images.
Add product variants with attributes.
Submit the product creation form.
Verify product is successfully created and visible in the seller's inventory.

title: Product Editing and Validation
description: Ensure product edit form validates all inputs, supports image changes and variant edits, and updates product successfully.

steps.description: Log in as seller and open an existing product for editing.
Modify fields including name, prices, and variants.
Remove and upload new product images.
Intentionally leave mandatory fields empty to test validation.
Check validation errors appear for missing or invalid fields.
Correct inputs and submit the form.
Confirm product details update successfully and reflect in inventory.

title: Seller Profile Display and Statistics
description: Verify that seller profile pages display correct personal info, business type, statistics, reviews, and product inventory.

steps.description: Navigate to a seller's profile page.
Confirm personal information and business type are displayed accurately.
Verify seller statistics and business performance metrics are shown.
Check recent reviews for the seller are listed.
Validate that the seller’s product inventory is visible and correct.

title: Settings Panel Business Type and Receipt Customization
description: Validate that sellers can configure business types, customize receipt templates, and update location preferences including geolocation.

steps.description: Log in as seller and open the settings panel.
Change business type and save.
Confirm business type is updated and persists on reload.
Modify receipt template fields and save.
Check that receipt preview updates to reflect changes.
Update location preferences manually and via geolocation.
Verify location data is updated accordingly.

title: POS Module Basic Order and Cart Management
description: Test that sellers can browse inventory, add multiple products to cart, adjust quantities and discounts via numpad, and clear cart.

steps.description: Open POS module as authenticated seller.
Browse inventory and add multiple items to cart.
Change item quantities and apply discounts via numpad interface.
Confirm cart updates instantaneously and reflects changes.
Clear cart and verify cart empties.

title: POS Multi-Order Tabs and Payment Splitting
description: Validate that POS supports multiple open order tabs, payment splitting between orders, and correct totals calculation.

steps.description: Open multiple order tabs in POS and add products to each.
Process payments splitting amounts between order tabs.
Confirm payment amounts are correctly allocated and totals reflect accurately.
Close order tabs and verify order creation and receipt printing.

title: POS Offline Mode Order Queue and Synchronization
description: Ensure POS offline orders queue locally, can be processed without network, and sync correctly when reconnecting without data loss.

steps.description: Simulate offline mode in POS.
Add products and complete checkout to create orders while offline.
Verify orders are queued locally and receipts generated.
Restore network connection.
Confirm offline orders synchronize with backend correctly and no duplicates or data loss occur.

title: Row-Level Security Enforcement in Supabase
description: Test that Supabase row-level security rules prevent unauthorized data access and modifications.

steps.description: Attempt to access another seller’s product or order data using API or UI with a different authenticated account.
Confirm access is denied and no sensitive data is exposed or modifiable.
Try to update or delete data that belongs to another user.
Verify modification attempts are rejected by security policies.

title: Real-Time Chat Creation and Messaging
description: Verify chat conversations auto-create on product views and support sending/receiving messages in real-time.

steps.description: While authenticated as buyer, navigate to a product detail page.
Check that a new chat conversation with the seller is created automatically.
Send a message to the seller from the chat interface.
Confirm message is delivered and visible immediately.
Receive a reply from the seller.
Verify reply is received and displayed in real-time.

title: Product Form Submission Fallback Handling
description: Check that product creation/editing form handles submission errors gracefully and supports fallback retries if Supabase is temporarily unavailable.

steps.description: Fill product form and simulate backend failure during submission.
Submit form.
Verify user is informed of the error with retry option.
Retry submission after backend recovers.
Confirm that product is created successfully after retry.

title: Settings Persistence and Receipt Preview Accuracy
description: Validate that settings changes are saved persistently and receipt preview updates reflect current receipt configuration.

steps.description: Update various settings parameters including receipt template in settings panel.
Save settings.
Reload settings page and confirm changes persist.
Check that receipt preview matches saved settings accurately.

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy
description: Confirm that analytics dashboard correctly displays sales, orders, receipts, and daily metrics aggregated from backend rollups for the logged-in seller.

steps.description: Log in as seller and navigate to analytics dashboard.
Verify displayed sales counts and order totals align with backend data.
Check that receipt overviews and daily metrics are correctly calculated and displayed.
Generate new sales/orders and reload dashboard.
Confirm dashboard updates to reflect new data accurately.

title: Responsive UI across Desktop and Mobile Browsers
description: Verify that all major UI components including product grids, forms, chat, POS, and dashboards render correctly and are usable on modern desktop and mobile browsers.

steps.description: Access key application pages on desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari).
Confirm layout, interactions, and responsiveness are as expected.
Access the same pages on mobile browsers (Chrome, Safari iOS, Firefox Android).
Verify UI elements scale, menus and navigation work, and touch interactions function properly.
